title: Software Engineer Intern
description: I contributed to the development of internal tools designed to test developer APIs and new product releases. My primary project involved creating a mock storefront that simulated a consumer-facing interface that a merchant might have, allowing developers to edit and test API endpoints effectively.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: I built from scratch the frontend interface for the Skyview System which was a digital clone that hangar owners could use to prevent ground damages to aircraft. This was a real-time application built in Unity and C# that required high-performance and precision (<= 10ms latency and 2cm distance errors). I also worked on an automatic plane scheduling application that used the Skyview System to track incoming planes.
